artist: Painter: Hamlet Winstanley; Engraver: Alexander Bannerman
description: after a self portrait; Winstanley at an easel painting a portrait of Nicolas Dorigny; brush in PLH, palett and brushes in PRH; wearing loose robes with the edge of a trimmed cloak over shoulder
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Bannerman sculp / HAMLET WINSTANLEY | in portrait in black upper right corner: Dorigny
title: Hamlet Winstanley
